paragraph1: In early 2022, I started my coding adventure and it's been a one-way journey ever since. Initially, I got into Python, driven by curiosity and passion I gradually expanded into JavaScript and front-end development as well.
paragraph2: Dive into the vibrant world of Full-Stack Development with me, where coding isn't just typing on a keyboard, but a quest for innovation! Armed with NodeJS, Python, and React, I explore the digital world, reshaping complex challenges into engaging riddles.
